title: Puppy Happy Birthday Banner | Girl Birthday Sign | Paper Card Stock Bday Party Decoration - Pink
features: LATEST DESIGN - Whether you're having a party for a person or a four legged family member this adorable "Happy Birthday" banner is sure to be a hit!
PERFECT SIZE - Each flag are made of 300gsm white card stock, measures 7.8 x 6.3 feet. Not too large or too small for indoor use.
HIGH QUALITY - Highest level quality control. No missing letters, no spelling error. We will never damp down your good birthday celebration mood with a defective item!
EASY TO HANG - Each package come with 4 clear suction cups and 2 strings. The suction cups will help you a lot if you want to hang this banner on a smooth surface.
DIY FUN - This banner is not pre-assembled. The plastic needle in the package will makes it easy to string the pennants one by one.
description: Each package come with a plastic bag printed with Silvima for storage the banner if you want to reuse it next year.
Do you have other color for option?
- We have blue one. You can check it out at our Amazon storefront.
Is this banner for human or dog?
- Both. It depends to you.
How to apply the suction cup?
- Clean the surface where you want to apply, keep it dry. Push the suction cup, squeeze the air out of the cup base.
How long is the string?
- Each string measures about 6.5 feet.
How big is the suction up?
- The diameter of the suction cup is about 1.18 inch.
How to string the banner?
- Each package come with a plastic needle. Tie the cord to the needle, then string the flags sequentially.
How heavy can the suction up hold?
- It depends the smoothness extent of the surface. Generally it is perfect for this lightweight banner.
Does the banner fit different size of area?
- Yes. You can adjust the space between each flag to fit different area.
Is it reusable?
- Of course. You can use the storage bag to keep it for next time use.
Why your products at such a good price?
- We always strive to provide an affordable, fair price with good quality for our products. We want you keep Silvima in mind. You can see our other creative options at our Amazon storefront.
How is the quality and your customer service?
- Customer service is paramount, we aren't happy until you are happy. We will always work to provide a product that exceeds your expectations for quality.
